info.title: Coaching Platform API
info.description: API endpoints to be implemented in the backend for the coaching platform frontend.

apis.description: Retrieves a list of featured coaches (stars). Requires filtering/pagination data in the request body.
Gets a URL for binding the user's account to an official public account (e.g., WeChat Official Account).
Fetches a list of cities where consultation services are available.
Filters the list of coaches based on criteria provided in the request body (e.g., city, specialty, availability).
Gets the list of carousel/banner items to be displayed on the main consultation page.
Retrieves detailed information for a specific order, identified by an order ID in the request body.
Gets the time window (in hours) within which an order is eligible for a refund.
Cancels an order, identified by an order ID in the request body.
